description:
Elevating your everyday. Slightly looser than our Slim Fit styles, Ultra combines super-softness with maximum breathability. Go all in with this Ultra 5-Pack.
Relaxed Fit: form-fitting through the butt and thighs, with extra ease at the leg opening. Features a fly for quick and easy access.
name: Saxx Underwear Ultra Super Soft Boxer Brief Fly, 5" Inseam - Mens - 5 Pack
